body:
Hey, do you have a moment?

Im here to talk about our lord and saviour,
The one and only holy Lapis cow!

So il be here to anwser a few questions if you have them!

And as final, i wish for everyone to spread the word of the holy lapis cow!

Greetings
Shiro.

replies.body:
Hey kycrafft!

Well im doing fine!

Ive been working for the last few years as a sound engineer going from festival to festival with giant heaps of speakers, lights and microphones!

I havent touched minecraft for about 2 years, and might return to bring faith of the lapis cow back to avicus!

replies.body:
Not always lucky Shakespeare!

My work hours can be brutal, starting at 6 am and working till 4 am some days only sleeping for 4 hours etc, but bands are always happy and the people that come to see them are even more pumped up, so its worth it!
